Description:
Detects when a repository or an organization is being transferred to another location.

Author: Romain Gaillard (@romain-gaillard)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Github Repository/Organization Transferred
Query: sourcetype='github-audit' eql select * from _source_ where (action = 'migration.create' or action = 'org.transfer_outgoing' or action = 'org.transfer' or action = 'repo.transfer_outgoing')
